analysis: The project is a static website with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files. The event requires implementing an Egyptian-themed UI with light desert colors, mobile responsiveness, clean design, and ensuring all buttons work. The existing to-dos mention mobile menu improvements and CSS updates for Egyptian themes.

improvements.description: Update the CSS with an Egyptian-themed color palette using light desert colors like sandy beige, golden yellows, and deep blues, and add UI elements with Egyptian patterns or motifs.
Ensure all buttons in the HTML have proper functionality and are styled according to the Egyptian theme.
Fix the mobile menu toggle functionality to ensure smooth transitions and user-friendly interactions, and verify all buttons work correctly.
